| Step | Hyp | Ref | Expression |

| 1 |  | #P_finnum | |- ( A e. Fin -> A e. dom card ) |

| 3 |  | #P_cardacda | |- ( ( A e. dom card /\ B e. dom card ) -> ( A +c B ) ~~ ( ( card ` A ) +o ( card ` B ) ) ) |

| 10 |  | #P_carden2b | |- ( ( ( card ` A ) +o ( card ` B ) ) ~~ ( A u. B ) -> ( card ` ( ( card ` A ) +o ( card ` B ) ) ) = ( card ` ( A u. B ) ) ) |
| 11 | 9, 10 | #P_syl | |- ( ( A e. Fin /\ B e. Fin /\ ( A i^i B ) = (/) ) -> ( card ` ( ( card ` A ) +o ( card ` B ) ) ) = ( card ` ( A u. B ) ) ) |

| 18 | 17 | #P_3adant3 | |- ( ( A e. Fin /\ B e. Fin /\ ( A i^i B ) = (/) ) -> ( card ` ( ( card ` A ) +o ( card ` B ) ) ) = ( ( card ` A ) +o ( card ` B ) ) ) |
